attributes.action: allow marriage for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons not 'civil partnership'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow marriage for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons not 'civil partnership'."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14546.asp

Prime Minister's Office
